data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shinohara, Akihiko, Wei, Mei-Cai (2016): Leaf-rolling sawflies (Hymenoptera, Pamphiliidae, Pamphiliinae) of Tianmushan Mountains, Zhejiang Province, China. Zootaxa 4072 (3): 301-318, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.3.1
